questiontext.text: Install the agridat package from CRAN (use install.packages("agridat")). Load up the hanks.sprinkler data. Use ?hanks.sprinkler to see a discription of this data. Calculate the P Value for the null hypothesis that the yield from subplot 8 is the same as the yield from subplot 4. Give your answer as a probabilty between 0 and 1, and give it to three significant figures.

generalfeedback.text: Filter the data set for only subplots 8 and 4 using hanks.sprinkler |> filter(subplot %in% c(8, 4). Use t.test(yield ~ subplot, paired = F, var.equal = T, data = filtered_hanks.sprinkler)$p.value.
